mapper.insert: /* InfntPrgrmDao.insertInfntPrgrm */ INSERT INTO TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM ( CLSSRMID , EDU_YR , PRGRM_NM , EDU_NOPE , EDU_HR_MNT , RCPT_MTHD_CD , APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , EDU_EXPLN , MTTRAT , EDU_INTRCN_FILEID , EDU_PHOTO_FILEID , MON_YN , TUES_YN , WED_YN , THUR_YN , FRI_YN , SAT_YN , SUN_YN , USE_YN , MDFCN_DT , MDFRID , REG_DT , RGTRID ) SELECT CLSSRMID , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') , CONCAT('(복사-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y'),')',PRGRM_NM) , EDU_NOPE , EDU_HR_MNT , RCPT_MTHD_CD , APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , EDU_EXPLN , MTTRAT , #{eduIntrcnFileid} , #{eduPhotoFileid} , MON_YN , TUES_YN , WED_YN , THUR_YN , FRI_YN , SAT_YN , SUN_YN , USE_YN ,NOW() ,#{user.userid} ,NOW() ,#{user.userid} FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM WHERE PRGRMID = #{copyPrgrmId}
mapper.select: /* InfntPrgrmDao.selectInfntPrgrmInfo */ SELECT A.PRGRMID , A.CLSSRMID , B.CLSSRM_NM , B.EDU_TYPE_CD , A.EDU_YR , A.PRGRM_NM ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(T1.CLSF_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_CLSF_MAPNG T1 WHERE T1.PRGRMID = #{prgrmId} ) AS CLSF_CD ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(T2.UPPR_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_CLSF_MAPNG T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD T2 ON T2.CD = T1.CLSF_CD WHERE T1.PRGRMID = #{prgrmId} ) AS UPPR_CLSF_CD , A.EDU_NOPE , A.EDU_HR_MNT , A.RCPT_MTHD_CD , A.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , A.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , A.EDU_EXPLN , A.MTTRAT , A.EDU_INTRCN_FILEID , C.FILEGRPID EDU_INTRCN_FILEGRPID , C.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY EDU_INTRCN_FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , C.ORGINL_FILE_NM EDU_INTRCN_ORGINL_FILE_NM , A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEID , D.FILEGRPID EDU_PHOTO_FILEGRPID , D.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY EDU_PHOTO_FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , D.ORGINL_FILE_NM EDU_PHOTO_ORGINL_FILE_NM , A.MON_YN , A.TUES_YN , A.WED_YN , A.THUR_YN , A.FRI_YN , A.SAT_YN , A.SUN_YN , A.USE_YN ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TRGT_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_TRGT_MAPNG WHERE PRGRMID = #{prgrmId} ) AS TRGT_CD , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_CLSSRM B ON A.CLSSRMID = B.CLSSRMID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE C ON A.EDU_INTRCN_FILEID = C.FILEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE D ON A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEID = D.FILEID WHERE A.PRGRMID = #{prgrmId}
mapper.insert: /* InfntPrgrmDao.deleteInfntPrgrmAply */ DELETE FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_APLY WHERE 1=1 AND TME_SCHDLID IN (SELECT TME_SCHDLID FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL WHERE TMEID = #{tmeId})
mapper.select: /* InfntPrgrmDao.selectPrgrmSettingList */ SELECT A.PRGRMID , A.PRGRM_NM , A.MON_YN , A.MON_YN , A.TUES_YN , A.WED_YN , A.THUR_YN , A.FRI_YN , A.SAT_YN , A.SUN_YN FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM A WHERE A.RCPT_MTHD_CD = #{rcptMthdCd}

/* InfntPrgrmDao.selectInfntPrgrmInfo */ SELECT A.PRGRMID , A.EDU_INTRCN_FILEID , B.FILEGRPID EDU_INTRCN_FILEGRPID , B.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY EDU_INTRCN_FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , B.ORGINL_FILE_NM EDU_INTRCN_ORGINL_FILE_NM , A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEID , C.FILEGRPID EDU_PHOTO_FILEGRPID , C.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY EDU_PHOTO_FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , C.ORGINL_FILE_NM EDU_PHOTO_ORGINL_FILE_NM FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE B ON A.EDU_INTRCN_FILEID = B.FILEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE C ON A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEID = C.FILEID WHERE A.PRGRMID = #{copyPrgrmId}

/* InfntPrgrmDao.selectAplcntDgstfnSrvyList */ SELECT A.SRVYID , A.QESTNRID , A.SRVY_NM , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.BGNG_DE , A.END_DE , B.QESTNR_NM FROM TB_CMM_SRVY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_QESTNR B ON (B.QESTNRID = A.QESTNRID) WHERE B.QESTNR_KND_CD = '110103' GROUP BY A.SRVYID, A.QESTNRID

/* InfntPrgrmDao.selectStdntDgstfnSrvyList */ SELECT A.SRVYID , A.QESTNRID , A.SRVY_NM , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.BGNG_DE , A.END_DE , B.QESTNR_NM FROM TB_CMM_SRVY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_QESTNR B ON (B.QESTNRID = A.QESTNRID) WHERE B.QESTNR_KND_CD = '110104' GROUP BY A.SRVYID, A.QESTNRID
